channel.title: Fishing help
channel.description:
[b]base: delta[/b] I have this annoying thing, when fishing and I walk away I keep fishing,
I was going to add [code=java] if (playerMovesFromSpot) { resetFishing(); } [/code]
Only problem is, I don't know where to search to let it detect that the player moves :|
Does any one have an idea?
Thanks in advance

item.title: Fishing help
item.dc:creator: @jaruanna jaruanna
item.description:
@jaruanna wrote:

I saw this cmdwalksteps method. Idk if it will help, i honestly have no idea what it does…

Read full topic

item.title: Fishing help
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:2, topic:431651”]Not too experienced with delta but make it do something like if (c.isFishing) { animation(0); } or something similar.[/quote]

I tried that, but since fishing is looped, it only goes false when I say it has to
e.g. when inventory is full, fishing = false;

thats why i need something like if they run away it sets to false to but I dunno how o.o

Read full topic

item.title: Fishing help
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

base: delta
I have this annoying thing, when fishing and I walk away I keep fishing,

I was going to add

if (playerMovesFromSpot) {
     resetFishing();
}

Only problem is, I don’t know where to search to let it detect that the player moves

Does any one have an idea?

Thanks in advance
